title: Merge Sort Algorithm
description: Implement the merge sort algorithm to sort an array of numbers in ascending order. The implementation should use the divide-and-conquer approach with a separate merge function.
requirements: Takes an array of numbers as parameter
Returns a new sorted array (do not modify input array)
Must use divide-and-conquer approach (split array recursively)
Must implement a separate 'merge' helper function
Handle empty arrays and single-element arrays
Time complexity must be O(n log n)

few_shot_examples.prompt: Implement a function that merges two sorted arrays into one sorted array.
Implement a function that recursively divides an array in half.
Implement a simple recursive function to reverse an array.
